txt.en: 'Undead bone-piles are the reanimated bones of the long-dead. I have had a chance to witness these terrible things in the past, and to my recollection, they will endlessly create skeletons until the pile itself is destroyed. Unfortunately, they are highly resistant to tactical and ranged attacks, and so must be dealt with hand-to-hand. I wish I could be of more help....'
Tell me about undead bone piles.
